localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Jumpr is the world’s first AR jump rope! Simply place your iPhone upright on the floor, Jumpr uses AI-powered body tracking to detect your movement and give you a virtual jump rope on the screen to begin skipping away!
blogPost.body: Jumpr is the world’s first AR jump rope! Simply place your iPhone upright on the floor, Jumpr uses AI-powered body tracking to detect your movement and give you a virtual jump rope on the screen to begin skipping away!
blogPost.title: Jumpr - Virtual jump rope APP
blogPost.author: David Liu

localize.description: Jumpr是世界上第一根AR跳绳！只需将你的iPhone直立放在地板上，Jumpr使用人工智能驱动的身体跟踪来检测你的移动，并在屏幕上给你一个虚拟的跳绳，开始跳走！
Jumpr是世界上第一根AR跳繩！只需將你的iPhone直立放在地板上，Jumpr使用人工智能驅動的身體跟蹤來檢測你的移動，並在屏幕上給你一個虛擬的跳繩，開始跳走！

previous.excerpt: Headlime’s Artificial Intelligence helps you write your articles, no matter what language they need to be in. Write with confidence knowing that every word is guaranteed to sound great and grammar-error-free.
previous.title: Blog Assistant by Headlime - GPT3-powered blog editor that cures writer's block.

localize.description: Headlime的人工智能帮助您撰写文章，无论文章需要用什么语言。充满信心地写作，知道每一个字都保证听起来很棒，没有语法错误。
localize.tagline: GPT3驱动的博客编辑器，治疗作家的障碍。

localize.description: Headlime的人工智能幫助您撰寫文章，無論文章需要用什麼語言。充滿信心地寫作，知道每一個字都保證聽起來很棒，沒有語法錯誤。
localize.tagline: GPT3驅動的博客編輯器，治療作家的障礙。

next.excerpt: Flinkit! provides remote teams with fun and creative cooperation opportunities to enhance teamwork and trust. Teams can compete at the same time as they follow the carefully designed storyline solving highly visual tasks and riddles.
next.title: Online teambuilding by Flinkit! - Web-hosted team building games for small and large companies

localize.description: Flinkit！为远程团队提供趣味性和创造性的合作机会，增强团队合作和信任。团队可以在竞争的同时，按照精心设计的故事情节解决高度可视化的任务和谜语。
localize.tagline: 适用于小型和大型公司的网络托管团队建设游戏。

localize.description: Flinkit！爲遠程團隊提供趣味性和創造性的合作機會，增強團隊合作和信任。團隊可以在競爭的同時，按照精心設計的故事情節解決高度可視化的任務和謎語。
localize.tagline: 適用於小型和大型公司的網絡託管團隊建設遊戲。
